name: acfun-helper-compresser
description: process the files in acfun-helper directory

scripts.betaSlim: gulp betaSlim && echo "删除一些文件以便减少插件体积，用于测试" && exit 0
scripts.start: gulp && xcopy.exe /d /e src\* final\ && echo "简化文件" && exit 0
scripts.zip: gulp zip && echo "将final文件夹内容压缩为zip文件 "&& exit 0

author: ncb
